thread.title: G. khural
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by G. khural

author: G. khural
title: G. khural
text: Very much satisfied and happy with purchase. Books r in excellent condition. I was a little skeptical at first as I have never bought used books for my daughter but was pleasantly surprised when received my first order. The books were in great condition. And it's just a beginning , I sure am going to continue buying more and more books for my little one. :)
